description.narrative: This activity (Service Provider (Kenya Essential Education Programme)) is a component of Kenya Essential Education Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £13,758,169. This component benefits Kenya, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management, Primary education, Secondary education. , with the following implementing partners: Adam Smith International, Ernst & Young Kenya. The start date is 26-07-2012 and the end date is 31-07-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
